Criteria: Company does not have HQ in China, Iran, Russia
The company runs or plans to run online multiplayer or live service games
The company is in the Online Gaming Industry
Company website lists AWS/GCP/Azure or similar cloud provider usage
The company has Stackshare/BuiltWith shows Terraform
The company has Job postings mention Kubernetes
The company has offices in Cyprus or in Luxembourg
Company is in the Online Gambling Industry
The company offers esports or live-betting
Company is in the Fintech Industry
The company is not a bank, insurance company, or belongs to huge investment groups
Company proceeds any kind of payments including POs and crypto, ETF, broker - Can be online payments, transactions, wallets etc
The company is using Terraform / multi-cloud
The company uses or advertises public cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure) in docs
The company mentions Kubernetes on Stackshare
There are press releases about multi-cloud migration
